ccre.log.LoggingTarget

  • Packages that use LoggingTarget 
    Package Description
    ccre.cluck

    • Uses of LoggingTarget in ccre.cluck

      Methods in ccre.cluck that return LoggingTarget 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LoggingTarget CluckNode.subscribeLT(java.lang.String path, LogLevel minimum)
      Subscribe to a LoggingTarget from the network at the specified path, with only sending data for at least a minimum logging level.
      Methods in ccre.cluck with parameters of type LoggingTarget 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CluckNode.publish(java.lang.String name, LoggingTarget lt)
      Publish a LoggingTarget on the network.

    • Uses of LoggingTarget in ccre.log

      Classes in ccre.log that implement LoggingTarget 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MultiTargetLogger
      A logging target that sends all logged messages to a set of specified loggers.
      class  NetworkAutologger
      A logging tool that shares all logging between networked cluck systems automatically.
      class  PrintStreamLogger
      A logging target that will write all messages to the specified PrintStream.
      Fields in ccre.log declared as LoggingTarget 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static LoggingTarget Logger.target
      The logging target to write logs to by default.
      protected LoggingTarget[] MultiTargetLogger.targets
      The list of targets that should receive logging.
      Constructors in ccre.log with parameters of type LoggingTarget 
      Constructor and Description
      MultiTargetLogger(LoggingTarget... targets)
      Create a new MultiTargetLogger.

    • Uses of LoggingTarget in ccre.testing

      Methods in ccre.testing with parameters of type LoggingTarget 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void BaseTest.redirectLogging(LoggingTarget newTarget)
      Redirect the destination of all CCRE logging temporarily, or disable redirection if null.
